amendment.description: To ensure the use of certain funds for projects relating to deep-draft navigation.

vote.text: Amendment SA 3054 agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.

action.text: Amendment SA 3054 proposed by Senator McConnell for Senator Perdue to Amendment SA 2978. (consideration: CR S4333; text: CR S4333) To ensure the use of certain funds for projects relating to deep-draft navigation.
Senate amendment agreed to: Amendment SA 3054 agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 3054 proposed by Senator McConnell for Senator Perdue to Amendment SA 2978.
